      • parseBook

        public SimpleBook parseBook(java.lang.String bookName)
        Description copied from class: Bible
        Attemps to parse a given String and determine the name of the book. Failing to find it within the specified books, return nothing, so that the user can either create a blank Book to use instead, throw an exception, or anything else.
        Overrides:
        parseBook in class Bible<SimpleBook>
        Parameters:
        bookName - the text of the book to attempt to parse
        Returns:
        a Book if the name matches one of the Books in this Bible, null otherwise

      • serialize

        public java.lang.String serialize()
        Description copied from class: Bible
        Serialize this Bible into a string that can be used to restore this Bible from persistent memory. Should serialize only that which is necessary to be able to identify this Bible and download the rest of the information. This would typically be the fully qualified class name of this Bible, and any IDs/API keys necessary.
        Overrides:
        serialize in class Bible<SimpleBook>
        Returns:
        serialized String representation
